title: Whitelist handleDAO as a pool creator
body:
Summary 

This proposal is to whitelist the handleDAO as a pool creator, verifying the existing troopersGarage Fuse pool and giving handleDAO the ability to create new verified pools. 


Background 

Handle.fi is building a multicurrency stablecoin protocol.

The pool enables users to deposit the native handle.fi governance token, FOREX, and deposit a range of stablecoins against it. Whitelisting handleDAO as a pool creator will enable this pool to be Verified. 

Links 

Website: https://handle.fi 

Discord:  https://discord.gg/77WDThbZJ4

Audit: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1WMbvtLCA07z5Jlg9k4tV76x8yDWV66-Z/view?usp=sharing

FOREX contract address : https://etherscan.io/token/0xdb298285fe4c5410b05390ca80e8fbe9de1f259b

 Motivation 

troopersGarage is the first lending pool for FOREX.  

Once the pool is verified, handleDAO will spread awareness about the first lending platform - RARI - that supports FOREX as collateral. 

The handleDAO may also leverage this pool to take loans out against FOREX. 
 
For - Whitelist handleDAO as pool creator and verify pool #72,  troopersGarage.  

Against - Do nothing
author: 0x2AF5a466965F1e1461fcc7CC1F3E6F919e4bdbf5
